thread.section_title: The Peninsula Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: supurb!
thread.title_full: supurb! - Review of The Peninsula Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: professor58
title: supurb!
text: This hotel and service is so so great. Have stayed several times and always great. Clean and modern, great security, yet have done a great job of retaining the classic old French chateau feel with modern d√©cor and design. The pool is wonderful; staff is wonderful. Some touches that go beyond other luxury hotels.. free minibar (non-alchohol), free movies, private boxes for newpapers. Never heard a peep from neighboring rooms. If you let them know arrival time a few days in advance (e.g. from an international flight arriving early).. they will try hard to get you into room early. This is a huge blessing if you are arriving on a flight from USA early in the morning and need a shower / nap. Other hotels make you wait until the official 3 or 4pm checking in time and encourage you to pay for the night before... the Pen does a good job of balancing all their international arrivals and departures. Just love this hotel.
